password_length.requirement: Passwords must be at least 12 characters long.

password_storage.requirement: Passwords must be hashed using a strong algorithm (e.g., bcrypt).

multi_factor_authentication.requirement: Multi-factor authentication must be implemented for all sensitive accounts.

sql_injection.requirement: Inputs must be sanitized to prevent SQL injection.

xss_protection.requirement: Inputs must be sanitized to prevent XSS.

input_length_validation.requirement: Inputs must be validated for appropriate length.

path_traversal_prevention.requirement: Inputs must be validated to prevent directory traversal attacks.

session_timeout.requirement: Sessions must time out after 15 minutes of inactivity.

secure_cookie_flag.requirement: Cookies must have the Secure flag set.

http_only_cookie_flag.requirement: Cookies must have the HttpOnly flag set.

csrf_token.requirement: A unique CSRF token must be included in sensitive requests.

tls_enforcement.requirement: TLS 1.2 or higher must be enforced.

encryption_key_rotation.requirement: Encryption keys must be rotated at least annually.

strong_hashing_algorithms.requirement: Only strong cryptographic hashing algorithms (e.g., SHA-256 or better) must be used.

role_based_access.requirement: Role-based access control must be implemented.

least_privilege.requirement: Access must be granted based on the principle of least privilege.

account_lockout.requirement: Accounts must be locked after 5 failed login attempts.
